spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The forlarren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The forlarren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The forlarren makes two claw attacks and one gore attack, or it makes three chromatic ray attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Chromatic Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.
